item.title: Sundown Sessions: Featuring The Big Now
item.description: My Radio Show: ‘001. Sundown Sessions - Featuring The Big Now’ Queens Of The Stone Age - Feet Don’t Fail Me (5:41) Franz Ferdinand - Take Me Out (3:57) Sparks - Propaganda (0:23) Sparks - At Home At Work At Play (3:05) Squeeze - Take Me I’m Yours (3:46) ADVERTISING BREAK David Latto & The Lang Spoons - Geordie Munro (3:05) The Big Now - Fast Cars, Soul Music (4:15) The Big Now - You’ll Be Sorry (3:40) Roachford - Cuddly Toy (3:48) ADVERTISING BREAK Ist Ist - Fat Cats Drown In Milk (3:19) Interpol - Slow Hands (3:04) Becky Becky - House Of The Black Madonna (10:16) NEWS The Motors - Dancing The Night Away (6:34) John Grant - Marz (3:58) Jacco Gardner - Clear The Air (3:39) Pink Floyd - See Emily Play (2:54) The Move - Hello Suzie (5:19) ADVERTISING BREAK ELO - Four Little Diamonds (4:09) The Detroit Cobras - Cry On (2:15) The Teskey Brothers - Rain (4:14) The Vintage Explosition - Don’t Knock Upon My Door (3:06) Del Shannon - Runaway (2:16) ADVERTISING BREAK Vermin Poets - Like Poets Often Do (3:18) Pavement - Here (3:56) The Velvet Underground - I’m Waiting For The Man (4:39) Nick Cave & The Bad Seeds - From Her To Eternity (5:35) The Filthy Tongues - Nae Tongues (3:13)
